autoMergeBy.description: Metric to use for automerging clusters

bitScaling.comment: Conversion factor for ADC bit values to μV

blankThresh.description: Threshold (in MADs) above which to reject samples exceeding channel median after filtering

blankPeriod.description: Duration of blanking period (in ms) when the common mean exceeds blankThresh

CARMode.description: The meaning of 'average' in 'common average reference'

clusterFeature.description: The feature to extract from your spike waveforms in order to cluster them

distCut.description: Percentile of pairwise distances between spikes on a site to use as a cutoff distance

evtDetectRad.description: Maximum distance (in μm) for extracting spike waveforms

evtWindow.description: Time range (in ms) of filtered spike waveforms, centered at the peak

filterType.description: Type of filter to use on raw data

log10DeltaCut.comment: Spikes with delta values below this cutoff will not be considered as cluster centers

log10RhoCut.comment: Spikes with rho values below this cutoff will not be considered as cluster centers

maxUnitSim.description: Threshold for merging two units having similar spike waveforms
maxUnitSim.comment: Units with a similiarity score above this value will be merged

minClusterSize.description: Minimum number of spikes per cluster
minClusterSize.comment: Automatically set to the maximum of this value and twice the number of features

nChans.description: Number of channels stored in recording file
nChans.comment: Distinct from the number of AP sites

nClusterIntervals.description: Number of intervals to divide the recording into around a spike
nClusterIntervals.comment: When clustering, take the 1/nClusterIntervals fraction of all spikes around a spiking event to compute distance

nPCsPerSite.description: Number of principal components to compute per site

nSiteDir.description: Number of neighboring sites to group in either direction

nSitesExcl.description: Number of sites to exclude from the spike waveform group

nSpikesFigProj.description: Maximum number of spikes per cluster to display in the feature projection view

nSpikesFigWav.description: Maximum number of spikes per cluster to display generally

outputDir.description: Directory in which to place output files
outputDir.comment: Will output to the same directory as this file if empty

psthTimeLimits.description: Time range (in s) over which to display PSTH

rawRecordings.description: Path or paths to raw recordings to sort

RDDetrendMode.description: Detrending mode to apply to rho-delta values in order to determine cluster centers

sampleRate.description: Sampling rate (in Hz) of raw recording

siteLoc.comment: x values in the first column, y values in the second column

siteMap.description: Map of channel index to site ID
siteMap.comment: The mapping siteMap(i) = j corresponds to the statement 'site i is stored as channel j in the recording'

trialFile.description: Path to file containing trial data
trialFile.comment: Can be .mat or .csv, must contain timestamps of trials in units of s

auxFile.description: Path to file containing auxiliary channel

batchMode.description: Suppress message boxes in favor of console messages

colorMap.description: RGB color map for background, primary selected, and secondary selected spikes
colorMap.comment: The first three values are the R values, the next three are the G values, and the last three are the B values.

corrRange.description: Correlation score range to distinguish by color map

detectBipolar.description: Detect positive as well as negative peaks

dispFeature.description: Feature to display in the feature projection plot

dispFilter.description: Filter to apply in traces plot

driftMerge.description: Compute multiple waveforms at three drift locations based on the spike position if true

evtMergeRad.description: Maximum distance (in μm) for merging spike waveforms

evtWindowMergeFactor.description: Ratio of samples to take when computing correlation

evtWindowRaw.description: Time range (in ms) of raw spike waveforms, centered at the peak

fftThresh.description: Threshold (in MADs of power-frequency product) above which to remove frequency outliers

figList.description: List of tags of figures to display in feature view

freqLimNotch.description: Frequency ranges to exclude for notch filter

freqLimStop.description: Frequency range to exclude for band-stop filter

frFilterShape.comment: Used in estimation of the firing rate of a given unit

frPeriod.description: Time period (in s) over which to determine firing rate
frPeriod.comment: Used in estimation of the firing rate of a given unit

frSampleRate.description: Resampling rate (in Hz) for estimating the firing rate
frSampleRate.comment: Used in estimation of the firing rate of a given unit

gainBoost.description: Scale factor to boost gain in raw recording

groupShank.description: Group all sites on the same shank if true

gtFile.description: Path to file containing ground-truth data

interpPC.description: Interpolate 1st principal vector to maximize projection of spikes if true

loadTimeLimits.description: Time range (in s) of samples to load at once
loadTimeLimits.comment: All samples are loaded if empty

maxBytesLoad.description: Maximum number of bytes to load into memory

maxClustersSite.description: Maximum number of cluster centers computed per site

maxSecLoad.description: Maximum sample duration (in s) to load into memory

meanInterpFactor.description: Interpolation factor for mean unit waveforms

minNeighborsDetect.description: Minimum number of sample neighbors exceeding threshold for a sample to be considered a peak

minSitesWeightFeatures.description: Minimum number of sites to have if using weightFeatures

nClustersShowAux.description: Number of clusters to show in the aux vs. firing rate correlation

nDiffOrder.comment: Used if and only if filterType is 'sgdiff' or 'ndiff'

nLoadsMaxPreview.description: Number of time segments to load in preview

nPassesMerge.description: Number of times to repeat automatic waveform-based merging

nPeaksFeatures.description: Number of potential peaks to use when computing features

nSamplesPad.description: Number of samples to overlap between chunks in large files

nSitesFigProj.description: Number of sites to show in feature projection view

nSkip.description: Show every nSkip samples when plotting traces

nSpikesFigISI.description: Maximum number of spikes to show in ISI view

nThreadsGPU.description: Number of GPU threads to use for clustering

nSecsLoadPreview.description: Number of seconds to load in preview

nSegmentsTraces.description: Number of time segments to display in traces view
nSegmentsTraces.comment: A value of 1 shows one continuous time segment

outlierThresh.description: Threshold (in MADs) to remove outlier spikes for each cluster

projTimeLimits.description: Time range (in s) to display in feature projection view

psthTimeBin.description: Time bin (in s) for PSTH view

ramToGPUFactor.description: Ratio of RAM to GPU memory

randomSeed.description: Seed for the random number generator

showRaw.description: Show raw traces in waveform view if true

showSpikeCount.description: Show spike count per unit in waveform plot

siteCorrThresh.description: Threshold to reject bad sites based on maximum correlation with neighboring sites

spikeThreshMax.description: Maximum absolute amplitude (in μV) permitted for spikes

tallSkinny.description: Recording will be interpreted as nChannels x nSamples if true

threshFile.description: Path to .mat file storing the spike detection threshold

useGlobalDistCut.description: Use a global distance cutoff for all sites if true

weightFeatures.description: Weight display features by distance from site if true
